verses.verse: Now these are the generations<WH8435> of the sons<WH1121> of Noah<WH5146>, namely<WH8035>, of Shem, Ham<WH2526>, and Japheth<WH3315>: and unto them were sons<WH1121> born<WH3205> after<WH310> the flood<WH3999>.
The sons<WH1121> of Japheth<WH3315>: Gomer<WH1586>, and Magog<WH4031>, and Madai<WH4074>, and Javan<WH3120>, and Tubal<WH8422>, and Meshech<WH4902>, and Tiras<WH8494>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Gomer<WH1586>: Ashkenaz<WH813>, and Riphath<WH7384>, and Togarmah<WH8425>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Javan<WH3120>: Elishah<WH473>, and Tarshish<WH8659>, Kittim<WH3794>, and Dodanim<WH1721>.
Of these were the isles<WH339> of the nations<WH1471> divided in<WH6504> their lands<WH776>, every one<WH376> after his tongue<WH3956>, after their families<WH4940>, in their nations<WH1471>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Ham<WH2526>: Cush<WH3568>, and Mizraim<WH4714>, and Put<WH6316>, and Canaan<WH3667>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Cush<WH3568>: Seba<WH5434>, and Havilah<WH2341>, and Sabtah<WH5454>, and Raamah<WH7484>, and Sabteca<WH5455>; and the sons<WH1121> of Raamah<WH7484>: Sheba<WH7614>, and Dedan<WH1719>.
And Cush<WH3568> begat<WH3205> Nimrod<WH5248>: he began<WH2490> to be<WH1961> a mighty one<WH1368> in the earth<WH776>.
He was a mighty<WH1368> hunter<WH6718> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>: wherefore<WH3651> it is said<WH559>, Like Nimrod<WH5248> a mighty<WH1368> hunter<WH6718> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.
And the beginning<WH7225> of his kingdom<WH4467> was Babel<WH894>, and Erech<WH751>, and Accad<WH390>, and Calneh<WH3641>, in the land<WH776> of Shinar<WH8152>.
Out of that land<WH776> he went forth<WH3318> into Assyria<WH804>, and builded<WH1129> Nineveh<WH5210>, and<WH5892> Rehoboth-Ir<WH7344>, and Calah<WH3625>,
and Resen<WH7449> between Nineveh<WH5210> and Calah<WH3625> (the same is the great<WH1419> city<WH5892>).
And Mizraim<WH4714> begat<WH3205> Ludim<WH3866>, and Anamim<WH6047>, and Lehabim<WH3853>, and Naphtuhim<WH5320>,
and Pathrusim<WH6625>, and Casluhim<WH3695> (whence went forth<WH3318> the Philistines<WH6430>), and Caphtorim<WH3732>.
And Canaan<WH3667> begat<WH3205> Sidon<WH6721> his first-born<WH1060>, and Heth<WH2845>,
and the Jebusite<WH2983>, and the Amorite<WH567>, and the Girgashite<WH1622>,
and the Hivite<WH2340>, and the Arkite<WH6208>, and the Sinite<WH5513>,
and the Arvadite<WH721>, and the Zemarite<WH6786>, and the Hamathite<WH2577>: and afterward<WH310> were the families<WH4940> of the Canaanite<WH3669> spread abroad<WH6327>.

And the border<WH1366> of the Canaanite<WH3669> was from Sidon<WH6721>, as thou goest<WH935> toward Gerar<WH1642>, unto Gaza<WH5804>; as thou goest<WH935> toward Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah<WH6017> and Admah<WH126> and Zeboiim<WH6636>, unto Lasha<WH3962>.
These are the sons<WH1121> of Ham<WH2526>, after their families<WH4940>, after their tongues<WH3956>, in their lands<WH776>, in their nations<WH1471>.
And unto Shem<WH8035>, the father<WH1> of all the children<WH1121> of Eber<WH5677>, the elder<WH1419> brother<WH251> of<WH1419> Japheth<WH3315>, to him also were children born<WH3205>.
The sons<WH1121> of Shem<WH8035>: Elam<WH5867>, and Asshur<WH804>, and Arpachshad<WH775>, and Lud<WH3865>, and Aram<WH758>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Aram<WH758>: Uz<WH5780>, and Hul<WH2343>, and Gether<WH1666>, and Mash<WH4851>.
And Arpachshad<WH775> begat<WH3205> Shelah<WH7974>; and Shelah<WH7974> begat<WH3205> Eber<WH5677>.

And unto Eber<WH5677> were born<WH3205> two<WH8147> sons<WH1121>: the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Peleg<WH6389>; for in his days<WH3117> was the earth<WH776> divided<WH6385>; and his brother<WH251>'s name<WH8034> was Joktan<WH3355>.
And Joktan<WH3355> begat<WH3205> Almodad<WH486>, and Sheleph<WH8026>, and Hazarmaveth<WH2700>, and Jerah<WH3392>,
and Hadoram<WH1913>, and Uzal<WH187>, and Diklah<WH1853>,
and Obal<WH5745>, and Abimael<WH39>, and Sheba<WH7614>,
and Ophir<WH211>, and Havilah<WH2341>, and Jobab<WH3103>: all these were the sons<WH1121> of Joktan<WH3355>.
And their dwelling<WH4186> was from Mesha<WH4852>, as thou goest<WH935> toward Sephar<WH5611>, the mountain<WH2022> of the east<WH6924>.
These are the sons<WH1121> of Shem<WH8035>, after their families<WH4940>, after their tongues<WH3956>, in their lands<WH776>, after their nations<WH1471>.

These are the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Noah<WH5146>, after their generations<WH8435>, in their nations<WH1471>: and of these were the nations<WH1471> divided<WH6504> in the earth<WH776> after<WH310> the flood<WH3999>.
